channel.title: Problem with Theiving Stalls
channel.description:
I was going to try and put in theiving stalls for my theiving skill, like most 317's. (Gotta do something unoriginal, eh.)
I can't figure out how to place the object stalls where they need to go, and when you click them, give money...
Anyone got the codes for this? >.<"

item.title: Problem with Theiving Stalls
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Thanks. The silk stall doesn’t work, though.
I’ll get through it. ^^

item.title: Problem with Theiving Stalls
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:1, topic:296371”]I was going to try and put in theiving stalls for my theiving skill, like most 317’s.
(Gotta do something unoriginal, eh.)

I can’t figure out how to place the object stalls where they need to go, and when you click them, give money…

Anyone got the codes for this? >.<"[/quote]

} if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 70k", 80, ###*playerLevel[17], 995, @@@, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 20k", 1, ###*playerLevel[17], 995, @@@, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 40k", 50, ###*playerLevel[17], 995, @@@, 0x340); }

just change the ### to the exp you want, just change the @@@ to the number of cash you want it to give

           makeGlobalObject(####, ####, 2562, -1, 10);
       makeGlobalObject(####, ####, 2560, -1, 10);
       makeGlobalObject(####, ####, 2565, -1, 10);

once again change the ####'s to the coords you want them to go…

PS: This is original, a lot of servers have stalls…

Read full topic
